Description: Mississippi Phosphates agreed to pay a $297,000 civil penalty ($50,000 which was paid to the Stone Utility Authority for the operation and maintenance of its drinking and wastewater facilities) in settlement of allegations it discharged contaminated wastewater and failed to report equipment failures in the required time period, violating emissions permits.
